definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]

sentences.english: It is celebrated on the fifteenth day of the first month of the lunar year.
sentences.chinese: 通常在阴历年的第一个月的第十五天庆祝。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Festival is on the fifteenth day of the August, chinese calendar.
In the lunar calendar, the years are designated by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
The Mid-Autumn Festival falls on the 15th day of the 8th lunar month.
sentences.chinese: 中秋节定于每年的阴历八月十五日。

sentences.english: On the last day of the lunar year, there is a big familydinner。
sentences.chinese: 阴历年的最后一天，通常要吃一顿丰盛的团圆饭。

sentences.english: Chinese calendar is a combination of solar and lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: 中国历是阳历和阴历的结合。

sentences.english: The 9th lunar month, with clear autumn sky and bracing air, is a good time for sightseeing.
sentences.chinese: 阴历9月这天，正值秋高气爽，适合旅行观光。

sentences.english: There are some solutions that come with lunar calendars for China and Middle East countries, but that's about it.
sentences.chinese: 当然在中国和中东地区国家会提供阴历，但仅此而已。

sentences.english: The “Year of the Rabbit” is one of the 12 zodiac symbols associated with the Chinese Lunar Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 兔年是中国阴历中的十二生肖年之一。

sentences.english: I am with my Papa and Mama in the Mid Autum Day.
sentences.chinese: 中秋对中国人来说是个仅次于阴历新年的日子。

sentences.english: The lunar calendar designates one of 12 zodiac signs to each year.
sentences.chinese: 按阴历的说法，每年十二属相中的“生肖年”。

sentences.english: Lots of chinese people will choose the auspicious day of getting married according to a lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: 许多中国人会根据阴历来选择结婚的黄道吉日。

sentences.english: The Chinese aren't the only Asians who have special customs to celebrate the beginning of the lunar year.
sentences.chinese: 除了中国以外，亚洲各地几乎都有过阴历年的风俗。

sentences.english: All traditional Chinese festivals are lunar calendar festivals.
sentences.chinese: 中国的传统节日都是按照太阴历计算的。

sentences.english: Calculating by heart, it's late winter, and the last month of the lunar year is coming hitchily.
sentences.chinese: 屈指算来，已是深冬，阴历腊月的脚步在蹒跚走来。

sentences.english: What's the date of May Day according to the lunar calendar this year?

definition: the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]
intercalary month in the lunar calendar/leap month

one's age, according to the traditional Chinese method of reckoning (i.e. the number of Chinese calendar years in which one has lived). In this system, a person's age is one year at birth, and increases by one year at the beginning of the first solar term 立春[Li4 chun1] each year, rather than on one's birthday./as opposed to 足歲|足岁[zu2 sui4]/see also 實歲|实岁[shi2 sui4]
method of calculating a person's age in years from birth/see also 虛歲|虚岁[xu1 sui4]/see also 足歲|足岁[zu2 sui4]
first month of the lunar year
New Year's Day in the lunar calendar
